amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the use of funds for EPA's climate change action plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional Record of October 10, 1995 to strike the language in the bill that would prohibit funds from being used for EPA's Environmental Technology Initiative program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 215 (Roll no. 709).
